#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t,i,n; string str;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	    cin>>str;
	    int n=str.length();
	    for(i=0;i<=n/2;i++){
	        if(str[i]!=str[n-1-i])
	            break;
	    }
	    if(i<=n/2)
	        cout<<"NO\n";
	   else cout<<"YES\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
